snippet.title: Widget Inc. Gameplay Introduction
snippet.description:
A brief showcase of my upcoming game, Widget Inc.

Check it out on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3184110/Widget_Inc/

Playable demo will be available during Steam Next Fest!

#Gaming #GamingCommunity #Gameplay #GamingNews
